name: Shotgun: 4-Player Death Match
overview: Enter the arena with your friends, grab a gun, and shoot the hell out of them! This great action game supports the "Classical Games 4-Player Interface", which you can buy online for little money, or you can even build one by yourself. More information about this device can be found here. Alternatively, since version 1.1 you can also use the "SuperPad64 adapter" and play the game using Super NES controllers.
